visits.text: Scenic drive from San Jose to La Fortuna through small villages and rainforest
Mistico Hanging Bridges self-guided walk (3 km loop)
Hike and wildlife observation at Arenal Observatory Lodge including Danta Waterfall and Los Cangrejos Trail
Morning hike at Mirador El Silencio exploring lava trails and rainforest (3 h)
Lunch at Soda La Palma
Journey from San José to La Fortuna (approx. 3h30 drive)
Arenal Volcano National Park: hiking on the 1968 trail and viewpoint
Mistico Arenal Hanging Bridges: canopy and wildlife observation
La Fortuna Waterfall: descent of the 400 steps and swimming
Visit to Don Jorge plantation: coffee, cocoa and sugar cane demonstration

activities.text: Night hike at El Silencio with Wildlife Tours Costa Rica to spot frogs, vipers and toucans
Optional evening relaxation at Tabacón Hot Springs or free El Choyin
Afternoon Sloth Tour and Night Walk at Papa’s Place
Swimming in the natural hot springs of El Choyin
Sloth observation on the Bogarin Trail

visits.text: Morning walk in Aguti Reserve
Explore Manuel Antonio National Park including Cathedral Trail and beaches
Rainmaker Reserve hike through hanging bridges and waterfalls
Afternoon drive to Marino Ballena National Park in Uvita
Journey Monteverde – Manuel Antonio (approximately 4h30)
Manuel Antonio National Park: main trail and interior beach
Kayak excursion in the Isla Damas mangrove
Catamaran tour on the Pacific coast: snorkeling and dolphin watching

activities.text: Drive from Monteverde to Manuel Antonio with toll highways and scenic Pacific views
Sloth and capuchin monkey observation with naturalist guide
Swimming in the turquoise waters of the park

visits.text: Visit La Fortuna Waterfall (500 steps round trip)
Ziplining adventure at Selvatura Park (13 cables, 1 km longest line)
Hiking trails at Santa Elena Cloud Forest Reserve (Youth Challenge and Encantado trails)
Full-day hike at El Tigre Waterfalls (8 km, 6 main waterfalls, 8 hanging bridges)
Scenic route La Fortuna – Monteverde via Lake Arenal
Monteverde Cloud Forest Reserve: hanging bridges and biodiversity
Hummingbird garden and butterfly park visit

activities.text: Drive from La Fortuna to Monteverde with scenic stops around Lake Arenal
Relaxing evening in Santa Elena, free walk in the village
Canopy tour (zip lines through the canopy)

visits.text: Arrival at Juan Santamaría International Airport and car pickup at Adobe Rent a Car
Short drive around San Jose and Walmart stop for supplies
Drive from Manuel Antonio to San Jose Airport with stop at crocodile bridge
Return to San José from Manuel Antonio (approx. 3h)

activities.text: Last evening in San José, stroll through downtown
